name: Investeringsfondsbranchen
goal:
The Danish Investment Fund Association (IFB) work to create the best possible environment for private and institutional investors giving them access to a professional management of their investments. The aim of the IFB is to:
• Secure an international competitive foundation for managing investment.
• Encourage fair competition and high standards of integrity, investor protection and investor information.
• Ensure safe, relevant and compatible information to the investors.
• Encourage the knowledge of investment funds and their value to the investors and the society.
euInitiatives: One of our most important objectives is to represent the investment management industry in relation to legislators and authorities - for instance the Danish FSA and the tax authorities. Further, our aim is to facilitate doing business. We monitor the legislative work and submit responses to consultations on behalf of the fund industry.
